td.style: height: 40px; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; background-color: rgb(0, 112, 192);
background-color: rgb(0, 112, 192); text-align: center; vertical-align: middle;

span.span: The ASD Board of Directors will hold Policy/ Education / Building / Finance Committee of the Whole Meetings on Thursday April 16 at 6:30 PM. Immediately followed by a special board meeting. Please be advised these meetings will be virtual.

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
span.a: Members of the public can register here to join the meeting.

p.span: After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the webinar.

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.span: The meeting will also be streamed live on our district YouTube.

span.span: The Allentown School District 2019-20 Final Budget is available for public view at the Business Office, 31 S. Penn Street, Allentown, PA 18105, or

Due to the ongoing COVID-19 crisis, ASD will accept responses to the Instructional Coaching RFP electronically. Please send any proposals to Director of Grants and and the Assistant Superintendent for Equity & Accountability.
Due to the ongoing COVID-19 crisis, ASD will accept responses to the Legal RFP electronically. Please send any proposals to Deputy Superintendent.

a.title: http://www.mcall.com/news/education/mc-nws-allentown-school-district-budget-20180621-story.html
a.style: letter-spacing: 0.07px; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; font-size: medium;

td.style: background-color: rgb(178, 162, 199); text-align: center; vertical-align: middle;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.07px; text-align: center; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular;

span.span: As we hope to move towards a system of distance learning, ASD recognizes the challenges that some of our families may face when it comes to technology in the home. Please fill out the below survey (one per child enrolled in an ASD school) to let us know what kind of technology access you have in your home by April 8!

br.a: Click here to take the survey.

br.span: A medida que esperamos avanzar hacia un sistema de aprendizaje a distancia, ASD reconoce los desafíos que algunas de nuestras familias pueden enfrentar cuando se trata de tecnología en el hogar. ¡Complete la encuesta a continuación (una por niño inscrito en una de las escuelas de ASD) para informarnos qué tipo de acceso a la tecnología tiene en su hogar antes del 8 de abril!

span.style: text-decoration-line: none; background-color: transparent; font-family: Verdana; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; color: rgb(29, 108, 72) !important; font-size: 16px;

br.span: Haz click aquí para realizar la encuesta.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.07px; text-align: center; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

td.style: background-color: rgb(178, 162, 199); text-align: center; vertical-align: middle;

p.span:
What is Restorative Practices?
Restorative practices is an emerging social science that studies how to strengthen relationships between individuals as well as social connections within communities. The Allentown School District has partnered with the International Institute for Restorative Practices to fully train our staff as we work to implement #RPinASD District wide.

br.span: The Allentown School District utilizes First Student Transportation for busing needs and is currently hiring for the 2019-2020 school year. If you are interested in working with First Student, please click below for information on the following jobs. These links will redirect you to the First Student website:
